title: Fuel Consumption, Measure (Z 22 SE, Z 20 LET)
htmlContent:
Fuel Consumption, Measure (Z 22 SE, Z 20 LET)

Use a fuel throughflow meter which can display total consumption and instantaneous consumption.

  Install

Measuring probe into the fuel line between the fuel tank and the fuel filter.

Fuel return line directly to the fuel filter.

Position the display in the passenger compartment.

  Measure

For an accurate result the fuel consumption needs to be measured in urban and extra–urban traffic.

  Remove

Throughflow meter.

  Install

Fuel lines.
